description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 24/02960/HOU (Demolition of an existing rear conservatory. Erection of a single storey rear extension, part conversion of an existing garage into utility. Front porch alteration, rendering of elevations and replacement of the windows.). Amendment to change first floor Juliet balcony into a window (Bed 3), change glazed balustrade to wrought iron Juliet balcony (Bed 1), remove one proposed first floor West side elevation window (Bed 1), remove glazing bars to rear and side windows (except Study), change number of glazing bars to front replacement windows, and alter style of front door.
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be material and as such, it is recommended that the S96A application for a non-material amendment to be refused.
